name: MoveTheGroove
description:
Move the Groove is a music-based card battler where you lay out your turns over 8 beats!

Made for the 2023 iGGi gamejam!  Might work on expanding the game with different note durations and a rogue-like drafting & map system.  Art Auto-generated/from game-icons.net.  (Apart from card borders).

Tutorial and a single battle with a pre-constructed deck.
